context.p:
Sometimes Memory Analyzer does not display reports such as Leak Suspects report or Component report and displays a message such as:
Failed to create a browser because of: org.eclipse.swt.SWTException: Failed to execute runnable (org.eclipse.swt.SWTError: No more handles because no underlying browser available.
or org.eclipse.swt.SWTException: Failed to execute runnable (org.eclipse.swt.SWTError: XPCOM error -2147467259)

note.p: On a Linux system, make sure that libwebkit2gtk-4.0 is installed.

cmd.cmdname: Select the latest version available of libwebkit2gtk-4.0 and install it.

choice.p: On an Ubuntu system use commands such as sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37
On a Red Hat system use rpm

stepresult.p: The operating system should confirm that libwebkit2gtk-4 has been properly installed

step.cmd: Run a report such as Leak Suspects report or Component report and check how the report looks.
step.stepresult: Check the HTML report is displayed.
